body:
i'm really keen to join in too, but have the same problem with funding to 
get there.  there will be a meeting of advanced daylighting simulators in 
Ottawa in October (7-11).  perhaps if the timing was right we could make it 
to Switzerland in the same trip.


Phil Greenup.
